Whenever this creature transforms into Defender of Festivities, paradigm 3 (Put three Charge Counters on this card. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a charge counter from it. Then if it doesn’t have any charge counters, transform it.)

card.name: Blood after the Storm
card.text: When Blood after the Storm enters the battlefield, Creatures get -X/-X until end of turn. If a creature dies, creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Blood after the Storm.

card.name: Rampaging Wurmcoil
card.text: Lifelink, Deathtouch Affinity for Artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Artifact you control.) All creatures able to block Rampaging Wurmcoil must do so.

card.name: Electrokinetic Hammer
card.text: Equipped creature gets +8/+8 Equip {10}. This ability costs {X} less to activate where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

card.name: Roadride Speeder
card.text: Haste, Menace When Roadride Speeder enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with “This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.” Crew 3

card.name: Constructed Security
card.text: Sacrifice Constructed Security: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: All-Out Tactics
card.text: Up to X target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to target creature you don’t control, if a creature dealt damage this way would die, exile it instead.

card.name: Burden of the Firebird
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Up to one target creature gets +2/+2 and is treated as a Monk in addition to its other types as long as you control Burden of the Firebird II — Target creature you control with power higher than it’s original power deals damage equal to its power to every other creature. III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Phoenixian Ascension

card.name: Phoenixian Ascension
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains “until end of turn, if this creature dies, you may have target opponent choose one — • This creature inflicts damage equal to its power to any target” • Return this creature to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control” --- (Front): Burden of the Firebird

card.name: The Aspirant to Glory
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. II — When you cast your next creature spell this turn, that creature gains haste until end of turn. III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Glory past Mattering

card.name: Glory past Mattering
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and haste. --- (Front): The Aspirant to Glory

card.name: Spirit-Forme Containment
card.text: When Spirit-Forme Containment enters or leaves the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. 2R: Sacrifice Spirit-Forme Containment create three tapped 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

card.name: Kindled Determination
card.text: Kindled Determination deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card.name: Harness Your Inner Strength
card.text: Transform target double-faced permanent you control, it gains “at the beginning of your upkeep, transform this card”

card.name: Masked Temptations
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature with 3 or less power. Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Chromatic Rend
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Seraphic Assistant

card.name: Shining Seraph Rig
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0, flying and vigilance. Whenever a player is dealt damage by a creature equipped with Shining Seraph Rig, they may pay {X} where X is the damage dealt, otherwise you draw one card. Equip {1} --- (Front): Seraphic Assistant

card.name: Spatial Assistant

card.text: Flying, First strike. When Low-Orbit Defense Unit attacks, you may create a token copy of target creature exiled with an information counter. Crew 3. --- (Front): Spatial Assistant

card.name: Loreweaver Teacher
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control. Lifelink.

card.name: Kami-Touched Hunter
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of each opponent’s end step, if that player controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: As once told
card.text: Return up to one target creature and one target enchantment with combined mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Yokai's Meditation
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+6 until end of turn, create a Mask token attached to it. (It’s a white Aura enchantment with enchant permanent and umbra armor.)

card.name: Honor-Bound Conscription
card.text: I — Create a 2/2 white samurai token with vigilance. II — If a creature you control attacks this turn, it can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power. III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Last March of the Honored

card.name: Last March of the Honored
card.text: Untapped creatures you control get +2/+0. Tapped creatures you control get +0/+2. --- (Front): Honor-Bound Conscription

card.name: Rampage of Inari
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Target creature you control has base power and toughness 5/5 as long as you control Rampage of Inari. II — Exile target artifact or enchantment with mana value less than or equal to the highest power among creatures you control. III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Inari's Sealed Influence

card.name: Inari's Sealed Influence
card.text: At the start of combat on your turn, you may choose one or both • Target creature has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn • Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn --- (Front): Rampage of Inari

card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Spirit spell or activate an ability of a Spirit source.

card.name: Renewed Blessings
card.text: Return up to two cards with different types from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Fabricated Onnabudo enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of cards you control and in your graveyard that are named Fabricated Onnabudo. A deck can have any number of cards named Fabricated Onnabudo.

card.text: Surveil 3, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand with mana value X or less. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
